Item.Value: [Text:Hey, name's $Character_7$. I heard that you might be needing some extra hands to help withsome of the monsters around here. All I ask is that you build me a place to live. Doesn't need to be anything fancy. There is no way I'm moving back in with dad.][UnlockBuildingID:55][Name:Introduction]
[Text:Have I told you about the time I took down a $Monster_4$ in a single shot?][Default][Name:1]
[Text:I've taken down thirty monsters this week. How about you?][Default][Name:2]
[Text:A gift eh? You sure you don't just want something?][Name:Gift]
[Text:You can't be serious. You're giving this to me? I've been looking for this! Thank you.][Name:Collection]
[Text:Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.][Name:JoinPartyYes]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.][Name:JoinPartyNo]
[Text:What are you doing skulking about in the rain? Not up to now good are you?][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]
